Package space.sunqian.common.base.process

Class VirtualProcess

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Process
space.sunqian.common.base.process.VirtualProcess
public class VirtualProcess extends Process
A virtual process used for simulation. There are protected fields:
  • alive: to specify whether this process is alive, initial is true;
  • normal: to specify whether this process ends normally, the exitValue() returns 0 if normally, otherwise 1; initial is true;

  • Field Summary

    The flag to specify whether this process is alive.

  • Constructor Details

    • VirtualProcess

      public VirtualProcess()
      Constructs a new virtual process. The result of getInputStream() and getErrorStream() are IOKit.emptyInputStream(), and the result of getOutputStream() is IOKit.nullOutputStream().

    • VirtualProcess

      public VirtualProcess(@Nonnull @Nonnull InputStream input, @Nonnull @Nonnull OutputStream output)
      Constructs with the specified input stream and output stream. These streams are the result of getInputStream() and getOutputStream(). The getErrorStream() will be mered into the getInputStream().
      Parameters:
      input - the specified input and error stream
      output - the specified output stream

    • VirtualProcess

      public VirtualProcess(@Nonnull @Nonnull InputStream input, @Nonnull @Nonnull InputStream error, @Nonnull @Nonnull OutputStream output)
      Constructs with the specified input stream, error stream and output stream. These streams are the result of getInputStream(), getErrorStream() and getOutputStream().
      Parameters:
      input - the specified input stream
      error - the specified error stream
      output - the specified output stream
